titles.title: Bulletproof Vest Police Safety Act of 1994

A bill to amend title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize inclusion in a community policing grant of funds to pay 25 percent of the cost of providing bulletproof vests for 100,000 police officers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3689)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
